Better framing: end-epoch delegates to introspect via gating system (like other skills do) rather than having custom retrospection logic - the retrospection was already introspection, just formalize the handoff.

input_full.title: Restructure skill naming: end-epoch and introspection renumbering
input_full.body:
- Rename `update-and-archive` skill to `end-epoch`
- end-epoch delegates to `/introspect` on completion via gating system (absorb retrospection into introspect framework)
- Renumber introspection levels so lowest user-invoked level is `/introspect 1` (current L2→L1, L3→L2, etc.)
